title: Average attendance of the main football leagues in Europe 2018 to 2019
yAxis: Average attendance in thousands of people
summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.

The maximum Average attendance in thousands of people 42.7 is found at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and the minimum is found at Ligue 1 (France) where Average attendance in thousands of people is 22.1.
There is a difference of 20.6 between the maximum League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and minimum League Name Ligue 1 (France).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is appeared to be the highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.

The maximum Average attendance in thousands of people 42.7 is found at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and the minimum is found at Ligue 1 (France) where Average attendance in thousands of people is 22.1.
There is a difference of 20.6 between the maximum League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and minimum League Name Ligue 1 (France).
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing League Name, and Average attendance in thousands of people in each League Name on the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is appeared to be the highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
The highest League Name Bundesliga (Germany) has 20.6 more Average attendance in thousands of people than the lowest League Name Ligue 1 (France).
Average attendance in thousands of people at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) is 42.7 , second place is  at 42.7, and thirdly is La Liga (Spain) at 27.2.
The League Name Ligue 1 (France) has 1.38 times less Average attendance in thousands of people than average.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is 154.7 if we add up values of all League Names.
